title: 98/583/EC: Commission Decision of 14 October 1998 on the list of programmes of checks aimed at the prevention of zoonoses qualifying for a financial contribution from the Community in 1999 (notified under document number C(1998) 3152/1)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 14 October 1998 on the list of programmes of checks aimed at the prevention of zoonoses qualifying for a financial contribution from the Community in 1999 (notified under document number C(1998) 3152/1) (98/583/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The programme listed in the Annex hereto shall qualify for a financial contribution from the Community in 1999.
2. For the programme referred to in paragraph 1, the proposed rate and amount of the Community financial contribution shall be as set out in the Annex.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 October 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 224, 18. 8. 1990, p. 19.
(2) OJ L 168, 2. 7. 1994, p. 31.
